subject: delivery update on Order #SSN4388
description_text:
Hello,
4th of December i have created Order #SSN4388 and i wast old that it will be
restocked last week and i will receive it this week, till today i have not
received any updates on shipping. I have paid extra for early shipping and
it was not yet shipped.

Can i kindly ask you when i can expect my order delivery?




BR

Miroslav Havelka

conversations.body_text: Hi Miroslav Havelka,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. As the item is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, we will arrange an urgent dispatch via UPS for you. Delivery is expected on the 22nd.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510435570018/trackdetails

Hello, thank you for urgent delivery, hopefully it will arrive before xmas
as it is present for my son. Thank you.

BR Miroslav
---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
